All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AesEcryption
The AesEncryption class provides methods to encrypt and decrypt text using the AES algorithm.
CheckIn
The CheckIn class represents the user registration window in the client application.
ClientAuthentication
The ClientAuthentication class handles user authentication by storing, encrypting, and verifying user credentials.
Communication
The Communication class manages communication between a client and a server through a socket.
LoginClient
 
MediaManipulator
The MediaManipulator class provides methods to retrieve and manage media files from specific directories within a files folder.
PlayerDocs
Class that represents the window to display the content of a document.
PlayerMusic
Class that represents the window for playing music.
PlayerVideo
Class that represents a video playback window.
Server
The Server class handles client connections and provides various services, including user authentication, file retrieval, and file transfer.
ViewClient
